title: Execute End-to-End Test Validation
description: As a QA lead, I want to run end-to-end tests so that I can verify critical user workflows function correctly.
soThat: I can verify critical user workflows function correctly
acceptanceCriteria: Given user journey scenarios are defined, when E2E tests execute, then all critical workflows complete successfully
Given system integrations exist, when tested, then data flows correctly between all components
Given test execution completes, when results are reviewed, then any workflow failures are documented with reproduction steps
